title: Top 5 Jaw-Dropping Incidents of Ships Hitting Bridges

scenes.narration: Ever wondered what happens when unstoppable forces meet immovable objects? Brace yourself for the top 5 shocking ship-bridge collisions!
Number 5: The Lake Charles disaster, where a tanker lost control and rammed into a busy bridge, causing chaos.
Number 4 takes us to the Sunshine Skyway Bridge, where a sudden storm led to a tragic clash, altering the bridge's history forever.
At 3, Sydney Harbour witnessed the MV Testbank's blunder, a spectacle that halted traffic and hearts alike.
Second place goes to the Big Bayou Canot tragedy, a barge collision that resulted in one of the deadliest train disasters in U.S. history.
And at number 1, the heart-stopping moment a colossal ship brought down Genoa's Morandi Bridge, a calamity that shook the world.
